OOC: I'm sure a lot of a you may know about the problems that
Excite@Home is having. If you dont I'll tall you. They are broke!
Bankrupt! The problem is that at 12:00AM tonight(or Saturday morning
depending on how you look at it) they may stop their service. That means
that all the Internet providers that use Excite@Home, suck as AT&T and
ComCast(I have ComCast@Home) will stop. If this happans, I will have no
way of getting online. I dont know what I'll do, or how long it will
take me to get back. If this happans, I will try to get back ASAP, but I
dont know. Anyway I wanted to inform you all of this. Hopefully I'll
talk to you later.
